Package edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tools

Mixed bag of command line utilities.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Interpreter  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalyzeF2E
    Analyzing how some Chinese words (given in "chWordList") are aligned to English words in the f2e alignment
    BLEUSorter
    Compare two system outputs (baseline and contrastive), and display sentences with biggest BLEU score difference.
    CompareWeights  
    DumpPossibleWordCoOccurrences  
    FilterNGramsByCoOccurrences  
    FindMetricMax  
    LanguageModelTrueCaser
    Language Model based TrueCasing This class implements n-gram language model based truecasing, an approach similar to that seen Lita et al 2003's paper tRuEcasIng.
    Levenshtein<T extends HasIntegerIdentity>  
    MappingSpan  
    MatchedFilesReader  
    NBestArgmax
    NBestArgmax utility - a command line tool for extracting the argmax translations from a n-best list for a given set of weights.
    NBestErrorSurface  
    NBestSourceHistogram  
    NumericFilter<TK extends CharSequence>  
    PrefixCompletion
    Prefix completion prototype
    PrefixTagger
    Greedy prefix tagger.
    ReorderTreeWithPatterns  
    ShowWeights  
    SigTestApproxRand
    Approximate Randomization Test for Statistical Significance Testing See Reizler & Maxwell ACL 2005 Workshop on Intrinsic and Extrinsic Evaluation Measures for Machine Translation
    SmoothBLEU
    Interactive smooth BLEU utility
    TreeLineToPennPrint  
    TreeToSpans  

Package edu.stanford.nlp.mt.tools Description

Mixed bag of command line utilities.
